shortMSG:
You are in the master bedroom on the 2nd floor. 
 There is a bed and a dresser.
 You may go upstairs to the attic, or
    north to the hallway 2 through the door
longMSG:
You are in the master bedroom on the 2nd floor. 
 Features: bed, dresser 
 Areas you may go to:
    up - ladder - attic - 3rd floor
    north - door - hallway 2 - 2nd floor
